fields.label: Incident Name
fields.name: incidentName
fields.placeholder: Incident Name

fields.name: howInfoReceived
fields.label: How Info Received
fields.placeholder: In Person/Phone/Other

fields.name: whyIsWitnessQualified
fields.label: Why is witness qualified to provide background information

fields.name: howLongLived
fields.label: How long lived at this location/area?

fields.name: whereTheyWereGoingAndWhy
fields.label: Did the MP tell anyone where they were going and why?

fields.name: thoughtsAboutWhereTheyMayHaveGone
fields.label: Do you have any thoughts about where they may have gone and why?

fields.name: weight
fields.label: Weight
fields.placeholder: Ex) 140 lbs

fields.name: fingernailLength
fields.label: Length of fingernails
fields.placeholder: Ex) 1 in

fields.name: odMeds
fields.label: What will happen if they OD on meds

fields.name: loseIt
fields.label: What would happen if they lose it or fall down

fields.name: ableToWalkDistance
fields.label: Able to walk distances, up/down stairs, around obstructions

fields.name: expressDepression
fields.label: How does MP express depression (turn in or out)

fields.name: mpAlone
fields.label: Where does MP go to be alone/to seek solitude

fields.name: signsOfDementia
fields.label: Any signs of dementia/confusion (Complete Section T&W)

fields.name: historyOfSuicidalTendencies
fields.label: Any history of suicidal tendencies (Complete Section U)

fields.name: subjectDanger
fields.label: Is the subject a danger to self or others?

fields.name: handleHeat
fields.label: How MP handles heat, cold, weather, darkness?

fields.name: medicalID
fields.label: Does the MP wear a medical ID bracelet or tag

fields.name: lastToTalk
fields.label: Who was to last talk at length with MP

fields.name: mpComplaining
fields.label: MP complaining of and/or voiced concern about anything

sections.heading: Summary of Events Leading Up To and Following MP's Disappearance

fields.name: whenHowDidYouFindOutMpWasMissing
fields.label: When/How did you find out that MP was missing?

fields.name: whatHaveYouDoneToLocateMp
fields.label: What have you done to locate MP?

fields.name: didMpSayWhereMightBeGoing
fields.label: Did MP say where he/she might be going?

fields.name: didMpTakeAnyMoney
fields.label: Did MP take any money, credit cards, ATM, checkbook with them?

fields.name: whatWouldMpHaveInPockets
fields.label: What would MP have in pockets/wallets/purse?
fields.placeholder: Ex) ID card, transit card, keys, medications, cell phone, etc.

fields.name: didMpTakeAnythingElse
fields.label: Did MP take anything else with them?
fields.placeholder: Ex) stuffed animla, favorite toy, etc.

fields.name: hasAnythingLikeThisHappenedBefore
fields.label: Has anything like this (or similar) happened before?

fields.name: describePriorEvents
fields.label: Describe prior events. Where was MP located last time?

fields.name: haveYouEverHadToGoOutAndFindThem
fields.label: Have you ever had to go out and find them?

fields.name: eventsLastFewHours
fields.label: Describe the events of the last few hours

fields.name: eventsLastFewDays
fields.label: Describe the events of the last few days

fields.name: eventsLastFewMonths
fields.label: Describe the events of the last few months

fields.name: howLongAgoDidMpEat
fields.label: How long ago did MP eat (and what was it)?

fields.name: doesMpKeepDiary
fields.label: Does MP keep a diary, journal, blog and/or an address book of friends (or relatives)?

fields.name: doesMpUseAnySocialNetworks
fields.label: Does MP use any social networks?

fields.name: anyRecentStressesOrBehaviorChanges
fields.label: Any recent stresses or behavior changes

fields.name: changesInFinancialSituation
fields.label: Any recent or past changes in financial/legal/criminal/family situation

fields.name: anyRecentProblemsAtWork
fields.label: Any recent or past issues/problems at work?

fields.name: actionsByFamilyFriends
fields.label: Actions taken to locate MP by family/friends/others

fields.name: additionalNamesForParty
fields.label: Additional names, cars, licenses, etc. for party

fields.name: anyAnimalsWithParty
fields.label: Any animals with party (horses, dogs) and number

fields.name: tendsToStayOnTrailsOrCrossCountry
fields.label: Tends to stay on trails or cross country

fields.name: favoriteFood
fields.label: Favorite foods
fields.placeholder: gum/candy

fields.name: otherClose
fields.label: Other close friends (list in Section O)
fields.placeholder: List this in Section O

fields.name: closeToFriendFamily
fields.label: Is MP close to friend's family members (list in Section O)

fields.name: hasBike
fields.label: Has bike, skateboard, scooter, roller blades

fields.name: takenTripsOnOwn
fields.label: Taken trips on own or with friends/relatives

fields.name: hasKnowledgeOfEmergencySignaling
fields.label: Has knowledge of emergency signaling
fields.placeholder: i.e. mirror, whistle, bright color clothing, three gun shots

fields.name: favoriteLocalPlaces
fields.label: Favorite local places
fields.placeholder: shopping, parks, play areas, restaurants

fields.name: personalHabits
fields.label: Personal Habits
fields.placeholder: (clean, neat, sloppy, dirty, etc)

fields.name: whoChoosesMPsClothing
fields.label: Who chooses MP's clothing and what is MP's response

fields.name: personality
fields.label: Personality
fields.placeholder: (outgoing, quiet, gregarious, loner, etc)

fields.name: giveUpEasy
fields.label: Give up easy or keep going

fields.name: anyPersonalProblemsOrViolent
fields.label: Any personal problems or violent tendencies

fields.name: whatDoesheSheDoForFun
fields.label: What does he/she do for fun

fields.name: afraidOfAnyAnimals
fields.label: Afraid of any animals or birds

fields.name: willHeSheChase
fields.label: Will he/she chase or try to follow animals

fields.name: contactOfClose
fields.label: Contact of close acquaintances in MP's religion

fields.name: liquidAmount
fields.label: Liquid Amount
fields.placeholder: in oz

sections.heading: Contacts Person Might Make Upon Reaching Civilization

fields.name: laptopComputerRecentUsage
fields.label: Recent Internet Usage, Browser History, Emails, etc.

fields.name: socialMediaYN
fields.label: Does MP Use Any Social Networks?

fields.name: socialMediaRecent
fields.label: Recent Log on, Status, Location Tags, Blogs and/or Comments

fields.name: CCTVYN
fields.label: Are There Any CCTV Cameras Available at the PLS (or residence) or along any routes the MP might take to a trailhead or the MP's goal (e.g. at stores, intersections, busses)?

fields.name: CCTVWhere
fields.label: Where Can the Recordings be Obtained?

fields.name: wifiDataYN
fields.label: Does MP have a tablet, smart phone, or laptop with WiFi capability or with a data plan?

fields.name: wifiDataPhoneNumber
fields.label: What is the Associated Phone Number?

fields.name: gamingAnimationSiteYN
fields.label: Does MP Use Any Gaming or Animation Sites?

fields.name: locationAppsYN
fields.label: Does MP use apps to locate their phone (i.e. Find My Phone, Find My iPhone, Find My Friends, etc.)?

fields.name: maritalStatus
fields.label: Marital Status and any recent changes?

fields.name: significantRelationshipProblems
fields.label: Significant relationship problems with any of the above?

fields.name: familyDesireToEmploySpecialAssistance
fields.label: Family's desire to employ special assistance

fields.name: whereDoYouThinkTheyMightBe
fields.label: Where do you think he/she might be?

fields.name: anythingElseAboutMp
fields.label: Anything else about MP we should know about or that might help us?

fields.name: groupMembersExperienceAndEquipment
fields.label: Experience and equipment of group members

fields.name: otherLeaderTypesInGroup
fields.label: Leader types in group other than leader

fields.name: whatWouldMPDoIfSeparated
fields.label: What would MP do if separated from group

fields.name: anyTrainingForWhenLost
fields.label: Any training for when lost
fields.placeholder: i.e. "Hug a Tree", find police, talk to stranger, phone app

fields.name: matureOrImmature
fields.label: Does MP act mature or immature for their age?

fields.name: howDoesMpAcceptPunishment
fields.label: How does MP accept punishment?
fields.placeholder: i.e. run, stay and take it

fields.name: performanceInSchool
fields.label: How does he/she do in school?
fields.placeholder: i.e. grades, get along with teacher, discipline problems

fields.name: mentionedAnyStrangers
fields.label: Has MP mentioned any strangers/new people lately?

fields.name: howAreTheyHandlingPuberty
fields.label: How are they handling it and are they sexually active?

fields.name: whatGamesDoesMpPlay
fields.label: What games does MP play with his/her friends and where?

fields.name: doesMpPlayHideAndSeek
fields.label: Does MP play hide and seek and where? (is there a "fort" or "clubhouse")

fields.heading: Close Friends, School Mates, Boyfriends/Girlfriends & Contact Info

fields.name: personAndContactInfo
fields.label: Name / Relationship / Contact Info
fields.placeholder: e.g. John Smith / Best Friend / johnsmith@gmail.com

fields.name: functioningLevel
fields.label: Is MP considered low-functioning, moderate-functioning, or high-functioning?

fields.name: cognitiveAge
fields.label: What cognitive age is MP at?

fields.name: trackingDeviceActivated
fields.label: Has it been activated? (Note: Look at F36 for Medical Tags)

fields.name: hasMpBeenAskedToGoToDestination
fields.label: Has MP been asked to go to an area or destination recently?
fields.placeholder: e.g. school, family, neighbor, or friend's house

fields.name: likesFascinationsDrawnTo
fields.label: Does MP have any specific "likes" or fascinations that they are drawn to that might help search effort? (Fill all that are pertinent)

fields.name: stimuliThatMayHinderSearchEfforts
fields.label: Any dislikes, fears, or sensory issues that may hinder search effort?
fields.placeholder: e.g. dogs, sirens, lights, shouting, aircraft, uniforms, loud noises, etc.

fields.name: reactToNegativeStimuli
fields.label: How will he/she react to negative stimulii

fields.name: likesToHideInSmallSpaces
fields.label: Likes to hide in small spaces

fields.name: pastHidingSpotsInHouse
fields.label: Past hiding spots in the house?

fields.name: pastHidingSpotsElsewhere
fields.label: Any past hiding spots in other locations?
fields.placeholder: e.g. school, park, etc.

fields.name: otherHidingSpots
fields.label: Other likely hiding spots
fields.placeholder: e.g. freezers, refrigerators, storage areas, closets, cabinets, under beds and small hiding spots in the house, garage, yard and outbuildings

fields.name: respondIfStrangersCallName
fields.label: Will respond if strangers are calling his/her name

fields.name: respondIfSingName
fields.label: Will MP respond better if searchers call or "sing" his/her name, favorite song, or a phrase

fields.name: respondIfSingNameWhat
fields.label: What is it
fields.placeholder: i.e. from a game or a frequently watched movie, TV program

fields.name: respondToParticularVoice
fields.label: Will the MP respond to a particular voice such as that of his or her mother, father, other relative, caregiver, or family friend

fields.name: particularRoute
fields.label: Does MP insist upon a particular route for going to school, the store, relative's or friend's house

fields.name: otherRoutes
fields.label: What other routines does the MP insist upon?

fields.name: otherRoutesFrequency
fields.label: At what frequency?
fields.placeholder: e.g. Once per week, every Monday and Friday, etc.

fields.name: aideTutor
fields.label: Has an aide or tutor at school or at home

fields.name: aideTutorContact
fields.label: Name, contact, description of role of aide or tutor

fields.name: resourceSpecialist
fields.label: Has a resource specialist at the school whom we may contact

fields.name: stressResponse
fields.label: What does the MP do under stress?

fields.name: sensoryMedicalDietaryIssues
fields.label: Does the MP have any sensory, medical, or dietary issues and requirements

fields.name: upsetEasily
fields.label: Does the MP become upset easily

fields.name: calmingMethods
fields.label: What calming methods are used or additional information 1st Responders may need

fields.name: stimms
fields.label: What kind of "stimms" (repetitive stimulation actions) does the MP do?

fields.name: stimmsCircumstances
fields.label: Under what circumstances does the MP stimm?
fields.placeholder: i.e. autistic child may rock and bang head against the car headrest only when the car is moving, or may flap his fingers directly in front of his eyes when there is "visual noise"

fields.name: atypicalBehaviors
fields.label: Atypical behaviors or characteristics of the individual that may attract the attention of responders

fields.name: methodOfPreferredCommunicaation (if verbal: preferred words, sounds, songs, phrases they may respond to. If nonverbal: sign language, picture boards, written words, etc.)
fields.label: Whom

fields.name: anyUniqueProdigy
fields.label: Any unique "prodigy" or "idiot savant" skills
fields.placeholder: e.g. math, music, art, computers

fields.name: specialNeedSibling
fields.label: Does the MP have a sibling with special need

fields.name: specialNeedSiblingWanderedAway
fields.label: Has that sibling wandered away before

fields.name: knowParentInfo
fields.label: Does the verbal MP know his or her parents' names, home address, and phone number

fields.name: disabilitySitCrawlWalk
fields.label: Learned to Sit Up, Crawl, or Walk Later Than Other Children?

fields.name: disabilityTalk
fields.label: Learned to Talk Later or Have Trouble Speaking?

fields.name: disabilityRemember
fields.label: Finds it Hard to Remember Things?

fields.name: disabilityPaying
fields.label: Has Trouble Understanding How to Pay For Things?

fields.name: disabilityConsequences
fields.label: Has Trouble Seeing the Consequences of His/Her Actions?

sections.heading: Depressed / Despondent / Possibly Suicidal (Verbal or Non-verbal)

fields.name: hasThereBeenAStressfulEvent
fields.label: Has there been a stressful event or significant loss (actual or threatened) in his/her life

fields.name: significantAnniversary
fields.label: Significant anniversary date(s)
fields.placeholder: (e.g. the passing of a loved one)

fields.name: expressedFeelingsOfGuilt
fields.label: Expressed feelings of guilt, hopelessness or depression?

fields.name: hasBeenExpressingGreatEmotionalPain
fields.label: Has been expressing great emotional and/or physical pain or distress?

fields.name: hasBeenPuttingThingsInOrder
fields.label: Has been putting things in order, e.g., paying up insurance policies, calling friends, giving away possessions?

fields.name: hasTalkedAboutCommitting
fields.label: Has talked about committing suicide, or said he/she is tired of living?

fields.name: hasAttemptedSuicide
fields.label: Has attempted suicide in the past?

fields.name: anyHistoryOfBeingCommitted
fields.label: Any history of being committed for 72hour mental evaluation (5150 Cal W&I)

fields.name: hasResearchedMeansOfDeath
fields.label: Has researched means of death, rehearsed fatal acts or methods to avoid rescue (e.g. internet searches)

fields.name: doTheyHaveTheMeans
fields.label: Do they have the means (e.g., gun, pills, rope) to complete their intent?

fields.name: areAnyWeaponsUnaccountedFor
fields.label: Are any weapons, kitchen knives, etc. unaccounted for?

fields.name: showsSignsOfSedation
fields.label: Shows signs of sedation, depressed respiration, a semi-hypnotic state, constricted pupils, depressed reflexes and/or intoxication?

fields.name: shownLackOfFeeling
fields.label: Shown lack of feeling, pain or fatigue?

fields.name: showingSignsOfLackOfCoordination
fields.label: Showing signs of lack of coordination, restlessness, excitement, disorientation, confusion and/or delirium?

fields.name: experiencingHallucinations
fields.label: Experiencing hallucinations, pupil dilation, increased blood pressure and body temperature, depressed appetite, and/or nausea and chills?

sections.heading: Exhibiting Signs of Dementia or Alzheimers

fields.name: hasMemoryOrOtherCognitiveLosses
fields.label: Has memory or other cognitive losses that affects job skills or daily life.

fields.name: hasProblemsWithSpeechOrLanguage
fields.label: Has problems with speech or language.

fields.name: hasProblemsRecognizing
fields.label: Has problems recognizing once familiar people

fields.name: isSometimesDisorientedToTime
fields.label: Is sometimes disorientated to time and place.

fields.name: sometimesSlipsBackToAnEarlierTime
fields.label: Sometimes slips back to an earlier time/place.

fields.name: obtainPriorAddressesGoingBack
fields.label: Obtain prior addresses going back many years.

fields.name: showsSignsOfPoor
fields.label: Shows signs of poor or decreased judgment.

fields.name: exhibitRapidChanges
fields.label: Exhibits rapid changes in mood or behavior.

fields.name: areProblemsOrIssuesConsistent
fields.label: Are problems or issues consistent, or do they vary from day to day or at different times of day (sundowning)?

fields.name: isThereAnyHistoryOfTaking
fields.label: Is there any history of taking a vehicle that does not belong to them?

fields.name: workhistoryLocations
fields.label: Work history, locations and mode of transportation:

fields.name: additionalNotesDementia
fields.label: Additional Notes
fields.placeholder: (***Note: If interviewer is a Mandated Reporter, record any notes that could possibly be related to elder abuse or neglect)

fields.name: additionalInfo
fields.label: Include anything that doesn't fall under a specific category in the questionnaire here.
